Package bto.Controller

Class ManagerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bto.Controller.ManagerController
  • public class ManagerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing operations related to managers, such as creating, editing, and deleting projects, handling officer registrations, managing applications, and responding to enquiries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ManagerController​(Manager manager, ProjectDao projectDao, ApplicationDao applicationDao, EnquiryDao enquiryDao)
      Constructs a ManagerController with the specified dependencies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagerController

        public ManagerController​(Manager manager,
                         ProjectDao projectDao,
                         ApplicationDao applicationDao,
                         EnquiryDao enquiryDao)
        Constructs a ManagerController with the specified dependencies.
        Parameters:
        manager - The manager associated with this controller.
        projectDao - The DAO for managing projects.
        applicationDao - The DAO for managing applications.
        enquiryDao - The DAO for managing enquiries.

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        public void createProject​(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String neighborhood,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Project.FlatTypeDetails> flatTypes,
                          java.time.LocalDate openingDate,
                          java.time.LocalDate closingDate,
                          int officerSlots)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new project.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project.
        neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
        flatTypes - A map of flat types and their details.
        openingDate - The opening date for applications.
        closingDate - The closing date for applications.
        officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an active project or other validation issues.

      • deleteProject

        public void deleteProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes a project by its name.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project to delete.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the project is not found or the manager is not authorized to delete it.

      • editProject

        public void editProject​(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String neighborhood,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Project.FlatTypeDetails> flatTypes,
                        java.time.LocalDate openingDate,
                        java.time.LocalDate closingDate,
                        int officerSlots)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Edits an existing project.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project.
        neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
        flatTypes - A map of flat types and their details.
        openingDate - The opening date for applications.
        closingDate - The closing date for applications.
        officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the project cannot be updated.

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> viewRequestedOfficer()
        Retrieves a list of officer registration requests, assignments, and rejections for all projects.
        Returns:
        A list of officer registration details.

      • approveRegistration

        public void approveRegistration​(java.lang.String projectName,
                                java.lang.String officerName)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Approves an officer's registration for a project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        officerName - The name of the officer to approve.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the officer is already assigned, not requested, or there are no available officer slots for the project.

      • rejectRegistration

        public void rejectRegistration​(java.lang.String projectName,
                               java.lang.String officerName)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Rejects an officer's registration for a project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        officerName - The name of the officer to reject.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the officer is already rejected, not requested, or assigned to the project.

      • approveApplication

        public void approveApplication​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Approves an application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to approve.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application is not found, is not pending, or there are no available units for the flat type.

      • rejectApplication

        public void rejectApplication​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Rejects an application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to reject.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application is not found, is not pending, or there are no available units for the flat type.

      • approveWithdrawal

        public void approveWithdrawal​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Approves a withdrawal request for an application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to approve withdrawal for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application is not found, no withdrawal is requested, or the associated project is not found.

      • rejectWithdrawal

        public void rejectWithdrawal​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to reject withdrawal for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application is not found or no withdrawal is requested.

      • viewAllEnquiries

        public java.util.List<Enquiry> viewAllEnquiries()

        Returns:
        A list of all enquiries.

      • replyEnquiry

        public void replyEnquiry​(int enquiryId,
                         java.lang.String reply)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Replies to a specific enquiry.
        Parameters:
        enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
        reply - The reply message to be sent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reply is empty, the enquiry is not found, or the manager is not authorized to reply.

      • generateReport

        public java.util.List<Application> generateReport()
        Generates a report of all booked applications.
        Returns:
        A list of applications with the status BOOKED.

        public void toggleProjectVisibility​(java.lang.String projectName)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Toggles the visibility of a project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project whose visibility is to be toggled.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the project is not found.
